thread.title: Mariah Carey wears lingerie to the gym because she's Mariah Carey
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey wears lingerie to the gym because she's Mariah Carey

title: Mariah Carey wears lingerie to the gym because she's Mariah Carey
text:
Mariah Carey wears lingerie to the gym because she's Mariah Carey Published February 03, 2017 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 Email Print 
Mariah Carey performs during a concert in Times Square on New Year's Eve in New York, U.S. December 31, 2016. Picture taken on December 31, 2016. (Reuters) 
Just over a month after Mariah Carey’s New Year’s Eve performance fiasco, the singer is clearly shaking off the negativity with a workout at the gym. 
But in true diva fashion the superstar wore unconventional fitness attire. 
The mother of twins wore a black leotard, fishnets, perhaps channeling a modernized version of Olivia Newton-John’s throwback classic, “Let’s Get Physical” video. She also wore a varsity jacket with a pair of stiletto heeled boots. 
She posted a series of video at Gunnar Peterson's gym Thursday. A video posted by Mariah Carey (@mariahcarey) on Feb 2, 2017 at 7:30pm PST A video posted by Mariah Carey (@mariahcarey) on Feb 2, 2017 at 7:18pm PST 
In addition to her risqué videos, she shared provocative pictures of herself on an elliptical machine as only Carey would do. A photo posted by Mariah Carey (@mariahcarey) on Feb 2, 2017 at 7:35pm PST 
We can only imagine the looks from fellow gym-goers. But hey, it’s “Mariah’s World” and we’re all just living in it. Advertisement
